A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: From beginning to end\, the most emotionless Star Wars movie I ever watched in my life. Sorry\, let me correct that; there was disgust and disappointment all over my face. I will cherish Episodes 4-6 any day\, and I'll praise the prequels over this movie any time. Ruined OT characters\, basically destroyed what fans wanted to see and shoehorn PC stuff. Please don't ever let Rian Johnson direct or write any Star Wars movie ever again. This movie was bold\, yes\, but on all wrong places.
